document.full_text: landscape maintenance equipment company stihl is voluntarily recalling due to fire and burn hazards 2.3 million of its gas powered products that use a toolless fuel cap, the government said on wednesday.
document.title: over 2 million yard power machines recalled: cpsc
lines_and_colors: landscape maintenance equipment company stihl is voluntarily recalling due to fire and burn hazards 2.3 million of its gas powered products that use a toolless fuel cap, the government said on wednesday.
